name: balatro-web
description: Web version of Balatro game, converted using Love.js and Express.js

scripts.build:lovejs: mkdir -p /tmp/gamedata && cp -R *.lua engine/ functions/ resources/ localization/ conf.lua main.lua web_api.lua /tmp/gamedata/ 2>/dev/null || : && cd /tmp/gamedata && zip -r /tmp/game.love . && cd /usr/src/app && love.js /tmp/game.love ./game_web -c --title Balatro && rm -rf /tmp/gamedata /tmp/game.love
